name: Fuveyu
strategy_rules:
select(P, O, S, M):-
    \+ holds(last_move(O, _LMo), S),
    holds(default_move(P, M), S).
select(_P, O, S, Mo):-
    holds(last_move(O, Mo), S).
game_rules:
:- discontiguous effect/3.
:- discontiguous abnormal/3.

/* Game specific predicates for Climate Control Game */

% Payoff matrix (control='C', no_control='N')
payoff('C', 'C', 3, 3).    % Both control: mutual benefit
payoff('C', 'N', 1, 4).    % One controls, other doesn't
payoff('N', 'C', 4, 1).    % One doesn't control, other does
payoff('N', 'N', 2, 2).    % Neither controls

% Initial state
initial(s0).

% What holds initially
initially(player(country1), s0).
initially(player(country2), s0).
initially(role(country1,row), s0).
initially(role(country2,col), s0).
initially(control(country1), s0).
initially(control(country2), s0).
initially(default_move(_, 'N'), s0).

% When a state is final
final(do(move(_P2, _M2), do(move(_P1, _M1), S))):-initial(S).

% Legal moves
legal(move(P, M), S):- possible(move(P, M), S), holds(control(P), S).

% Possible moves
possible(move(P,'C'), S):- holds(player(P), S).
possible(move(P,'N'), S):- holds(player(P), S).

% Opposite moves
opposite_move('C', 'N').
opposite_move('N', 'C').

% Effects of moves
effect(did(P, M), move(P, M), _S).
abnormal(control(P), move(P, _M), _S).

% What holds finally
finally(outcome(P1,M1,U1,P2,M2,U2), S):-
    final(S),
    holds(role(P1, row), S),
    holds(did(P1, M1), S),
    holds(role(P2, col), S),
    holds(did(P2, M2), S),
    payoff(M1, M2, U1, U2).

finally(goal(P1, U1), S):-
    finally(outcome(P1,_,U1,_,_,_), S).
finally(goal(P2, U2), S):-
    finally(outcome(_,_,_,P2,_,U2), S).
